Hi! I’m Tim Smith, a designer, front-end developer, and broadcaster.

Let's Work Together

What I Do

User Interface/Web Design

Work with me to make your website or interface look great, with wireframes and high-fidelity mockups that make the user first priority.

Front-End Development

With my attention to detail and understanding of standards-based markup, your website will respond quickly on any device.

Podcast Consulting

Make your podcast successful by focusing on your audience, choosing the right equipment, and knowing how and when to bring on sponsors.

Latest Work

Clinton Foundation

I helped the Clinton Foundation—together with the help of Crush + Lovely—to create a mobile Safari app for their visit to Africa.
